name: Chihiro's Mission
description:
Controls:

Xbox Gamepad: A = Jump, B = Burrow, X = Seed, RB / LB for Seed selection, other auxiliary buttons (Hold Select for level reset, Start for pause, RT/LT are mapped as well)

Keyboard: WASD, SPACE for jump, CTRL for Burrow, F for Seed, Q/E for Seed selection, U for level reset, ESC for pause

This jam was quite rough, I had to restart half way because my first project just ceased functioning completely (I imagine it might have something to do with trying to use structs and enums for the first time and probably doing it wrong). I'm still pretty happy with the result! 

It's a sort of experimental platformer with a planting mechanic, sadly I had to rush levels a bit and could not explore the mechanics I built more.

I made all assets except for the sky, the UI font and the music! (Hopefully not forgetting anything, but I don’t think so)

There seem to be a few bugs that sometimes occur related to movement that I unfortunately did not have time to investigate and fix!
